content: Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong can't be upgraded, so you can't increase their power or boost the effect of them. Therefore, you will want to switch to other Curios items to better fit your build as you  if needed. This can be done easily from the game's Equipment menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Boshan_Censer.md', within the main section titled 'Boshan Censer'.
The content is as follows:
Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong can't be upgraded, so you can't increase their power or boost the effect of them. Therefore, you will want to switch to other Curios items to better fit your build as you  if needed. This can be done easily from the game's Equipment menu.
